projectGridLines.title: Project 1 Title: Intern for Carbon Footprint Analysis, Benchmarking, and Energy Efficiency  Enhancement
projectGridLines.description:
Description:

The intern will lead a project to assess the carbon footprint of our 14 medical centers

located across 6 countries in Asia. This project involves collecting data,

benchmarking against similar organizations, and developing a framework for

continuous tracking, reporting, and reduction of carbon emissions. Simultaneously,

the intern will work towards identifying and implementing energy-efficient practices.

Additionally, they will help oversee the automation of data collection and reporting

processes, aiming to reduce human intervention and improve overall operational

efficiency.

Skill sets:

• Knowledge of carbon footprint analysis and energy efficiency metrics

• Familiarity with sustainability and environmental impact assessment tools

• Basic understanding of automation technologies

• Data analysis and reporting (proficiency in Excel, Power BI, or similar tools)

• Project management skills to oversee the framework development and implementation

• Good understanding of technical documentation and reporting

• Familiarity with sustainability standards such as ISO 14001 is a plus

Traits expectation:

• Self-motivated and proactive in identifying areas for improvement

• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

• Ability to work independently and in cross-functional teams

• Attention to detail and precision in data handling

• Enthusiasm for sustainability and environmental initiatives

• Good communication skills to collaborate with different stakeholders

Expected learning:

• Practical experience in conducting and interpreting carbon footprint assessments

• Exposure to energy-efficient practices and green building certifications

• Project management and automation techniques in a real-world setting

• Understanding of sustainability frameworks and global standards

• Experience in working with multidisciplinary teams and implementing actionable insights

Disciplines/courses in the following areas preferred:

• Sustainability and Environmental Management

• Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy Systems

• Data Analytics for Environmental Decision-Making

• Automation in Industry (Robotics and AI Integration)

• Project Management for Engineers

• Carbon Footprint Calculation and Reporting Tools (such as GHG Protocol)
